metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18198 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: print_iso9660_recurse in iso-info.c in GNU libcdio before 1.0.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted iso file.

criterions.comment: libcdio package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-2').
